attributes.action: Award JK Rowling for services to the family.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't know about anyone else, but I really believe that the UK should honour in some way the greatest author of our time.  Not a Damehood, as that is cheesy, but something meaningful representing the deepest respect and affection to which she is held worldwide.  Suggestions please?
